fields.text: Welcome to Shipt in San Francisco, where same-day delivery makes a difference in your life.
For help with an existing order, press [INDEX].
To track your delivery status, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we retrieve your delivery status.
To modify or cancel your order, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our order support team.
For membership or account assistance, press [INDEX].
For questions about Shipt memberships and pricing, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to membership support.
For help with the Shipt app or website, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.
